snippet: Three days of experiments with the human voice, with performances and with interaction with the audience at the Resonant Bodies Festival in Park Slope, Brooklyn.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews several performances of contemporary vocal music at ShapeShifter Lab as part of Resonant Bodies Festival.
lead_paragraph: Three days of experiments with the human voice, with performances and with interaction with the audience at the Resonant Bodies Festival in Park Slope, Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Resonant Bodies Festival at ShapeShifter Lab in Brooklyn
headline.main: Playing With Acoustic Tension at Entertaining Frequencies
headline.print_headline: Playing With Acoustic Tension at Entertaining Frequencies
